data.title: Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years
data.meta_description: View photos of Cher's iconic style over the years. The singer and fashion icon, born in 1946, celebrates her birthday on May 20.
data.text:
View photos of Cher’s iconic style over the years. The singer and fashion icon, born in 1946, celebrates her birthday on May 20.

1973, ’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Sonny Bono and Cher attend the 45th Academy Awards in Los Angeles, California, on March 27, 1973.

1993, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends a Council of Designers of America event at Lincoln Center in New York City on February 2, 1993.

1978, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the YSL’s Opium Perfume Launch Party in 1978.

1975, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends an event at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel in Beverly Hills, California, on April 5, 1975.

2017, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher performs during the 2017 Billboard Music Awards at T-Mobile Arena on May 21, 2017 in Las Vegas, Nevada.

1983, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and David Geffen attend an event at the MGM lot in Culver City, California, on January 28, 1983.

1977, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends the opening of Filmex ’77 in Los Angeles, California, on March 9, 1977.

2022, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the premiere of “Chevalier” held at El Capitan Theatre on April 16, 2022.

1978, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Kate Jackson and Cher attend an event at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art in Los Angeles, California, on January 15, 1978.

1988, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher dressed in a costume by designer Bob Mackie debuts her new perfume “Uninhibited” in 1988.

2017, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher performs with dancers during the 2017 Billboard Music Awards at T-Mobile Arena on May 21, 2017 in Las Vegas, Nevada.

1974, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Joni Mitchell, John Guerin and Cher attend the American Civil Liberties Union’s tribute to Henry Fonda at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel in Beverly Hills, California, on June 1, 1974.

1998, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Elijah Blue Allman and his mother, Cher, attend the 70th Academy Awards at the Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles, California, on March 23, 1998.

2018, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the ‘The Cher Show’ Broadway opening in 2018.

1974, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

David Geffen and Cher attend the Los Angeles premiere of ‘The Rocky Horror Show’ stage musical at The Roxy Theatre on March 22, 1974.

1973, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher Bono attending the opening of, “Last Tango in Paris” in 1973.

2022, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the 2022 CFDA Fashion Awards held at Casa Cipriani on November 7, 2022 in New York City.

1974, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends a preview screening of ‘Chinatown’ at the headquarters of the Directors Guild of America in Los Angeles, California, on June 19, 1974.

1973, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Sonny Bono and Cher attend the Los Angeles premiere of the documentary film ‘Wattstax’ at the Ahmanson Theatre in Los Angeles on February 3, 1973.

2006, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and Dean Winters attend Visionaire’s 48 Magic launch party at Visionaire Gallery in 2006.

1979, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher walks the runway during an event, supporting the Campaign for Economic Democracy’s anti-nuclear energy “Plug in the Sun” program, at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel in Beverly Hills, California, on May 22, 1979.

2013, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends Gareth Pugh’s fall 2013 runway show at Hotel Salomon de Rothschild.

1972, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Sonny Bono and Cher attend a party at the Bistro in Beverly Hills, California, celebrating the opening of the Merle Oberon Playhouse, on October 15, 1972.

2006, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends Dior’s fall 2006 couture runway show at Polo de Paris.

1979, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends the opening of her first solo concert tour, titled “Take Me Home,” at Caesar’s Palace in Las Vegas, Nevada, on July 5, 1979.

1980, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and Chastity Bono attend an event at Mann’s Chinese Theatre in Hollywood, California, on December 9, 1980.

2021, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends The Academy Museum Of Motion Pictures Opening Gala at Academy Museum of Motion Pictures on September 25, 2021 in Los Angeles, California.

1983, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Val Kilmer and Cher attend the 55th Academy Awards at the Dorothy Chandler Pavillion in Los Angeles, California, on April 11, 1983.

1978, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher appears onstage during a benefit event, raising money to advocate for passage of the Equal Rights Amendment, in Bel Air, California, on June 13, 1978.

2023, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at “Carol Burnett: 90 Years of Laughter + Love” held at Avalon Hollywood on March 2, 2023.

2000, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher in 2000.

1977, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Steve Rubell and Cher attend the opening of nightclub Studio 54 in New York City on April 27, 1977.

1974, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and David Geffen attend a party at 21 in New York City following Frank Sinatra’s concert at Carnegie Hall on April 8, 1974.

2017, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Kim Kardashian West and Cher at the ‘The Promise’ film premiere in 2017.

1974, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Chastity Bono in her mother, Cher’s arms at the opening of her grandmother, Georgia Holt’s new quilt and antique shop in 1974.

2005, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher performs at the North Harbour Stadium, Auckland, Sunday February20, 2005, in the first of her two New Zealand concerts during her world farewell tour.

1985, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher, 1985.

1974, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and David Geffen attend the 46th Academy Awards at the Dorothy Chandler Pavillion in Los Angeles, California, on April 2, 1974.

2024, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher, winner of the Icon award, pose in the press room at the 2024 iHeartRadio Music Awards held at the Dolby Theatre on April 1, 2024 in Los Angeles, California.

1975, Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends a party, marking the conclusion of a North American tour by Faces, at the Greenhouse in Los Angeles on March 11, 1975.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends an event at the Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles, California, on April 11, 1988.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher performs during her Here We Go Again Tour at Rod Laver Arena on October 3, 2018 in Melbourne, Australia.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends the 54th Golden Globe Awards at the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Beverly Hills, California, on January 19, 1997.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the Merle Oberon Playhouse in Los Angeles in 1972.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and guests attend the opening gala for an exhibit honoring late Italian designer Gianni Versace at the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City on December 8, 1997.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher performs during an event at the National Building Museum in Washington, D.C., in June 21, 1989.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball held at Madison Square Garden on December 8, 2023 in New York City.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher attends an event at Elaine’s, a restaurant in New York City, on December 2, 1987.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Entertainer Cher arrives at the Bob Mackie Spring 1986 Ready to Wear runway show.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Singer Cher poses for portraits and discusses the beginnings of a solo musical career at The Plaza Hotel on April 16, 1969 in New York City.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher wearing a beaded top and white pants attending a party at The Greenhouse in Los Angeles for the end of Rod Stewart and The Faces’ tour in 1975.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the premiere of “Sidney” held at the Academy Museum of Motion Pictures on September 21, 2022.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher and Sonny Bono at a party thrown by Hugh Hefner at The Playboy Mansion in 1973.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the Academy Awards 1986.

Cher’s Iconic Style Over the Years

Cher at the 1988 Academy Awards.
